env HOME=$WORK/home

# Gunk generate with out specified in config
! gunk generate ./gunk
stderr 'unable to load gunkconfig: no .gunkconfig found'

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/util

-- gunk/doc.go --
package util // make this directory a Go package

-- gunk/util.gunk --
package util

type Message struct {
	Msg string `pb:"1"`
}

type Util interface {
	// Echo echoes a message.
	Echo(Message) Message
}
